title: WCAS BIOL_SCI 103-0-01 Diversity of Life
class_attributes:
Natural Sciences Distro Area

Attendance at 1st class mandatory

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Overview of living things (and especially of Animals), past and present, from chronological and phylogenetic perspectives.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Textbook: THE STORY OF LIFE, by R. Southwood, Oxford University Press, ISBN 0198607865
